channel.title: [davidscape][508] connection help
channel.description:
I'm not sure if this is client or server side but..
When I'm trying to connect to the 508 server, davidscape, that i ran before the client it just stops at connecting to update server.
I had a 317 server, it ran fine.
I'm pretty sure i have the right cache. titan cache, if thats wrong could you please link me to the right cache...I cannot find the right one...i have searched.
Thanks.

item.title: [davidscape][508] connection help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

What type are you guys running? HD or LD?

Read full topic

item.title: [davidscape][508] connection help
item.dc:creator: @XterierK XterierK
item.description:
@XterierK wrote:

Yeah, the server was up before I loaded up the client.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2009, 12:59:13 pm[/size][hr]The server also knows that i’m trying to connect.

it reads Connection revieced from: 127.0.0.1[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2009, 01:13:38 pm[/size][hr]help pl0x

Read full topic

item.title: [davidscape][508] connection help
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

The server must be on before the client loads or it’ll do that. Is it?

item.description:
@XterierK wrote:

item.title: [davidscape][508] connection help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Make sure the server is in the right place, and that the cache is in the correct location, and named correctly for your client.

Read full topic
